title: Main Support looking for either Duo partner or ranked team - Bronze
body:
Hey guys, 

The name is Blondayy and I am looking for a person who I can duo with in bronze, preferably an adc. Also looking for a ranked 5s bronze / silver team to join. I main Leona, Nami and Thresh. 

Message my IGN: Blondayy or post below. 

Cheers guys :)

replies.body: ADC main currently silver 5 Add me BallSoHard
Where abouts are you located bud?
